page.title: 18SHOPPING FACILITIES IN LEVEN
page.content: In Leven we have 8 shops; these include a bakery,a butchers, a greengrocers, two general stores, a clothes shop & a shop selling pottery,china & glass ware. I went out to ask ten ladies what they thought about the shopping facilities in Leven. I asked them what they thought about the shops in the village some thought they were, poor most of them thought that they were allright.I asked them if they always shopped in Leven, five said sometimes.Then I asked them if they shopped daily,weekly or monthly.Most of them shopped weekly, they said they usually shopped at large stores like Asda,Sainsburys,Presto,and British Home Stores as they had a better selection and more choice.
